docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: About
docs.text: This is a Uvicorn-powered ASGI application using MkDocs for documentation.

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text: Endpoint: /auth/login Method: POST Description: Allows users to authenticate.

docs.title: Deploying with GitHub Actions
docs.text: This project is automatically deployed to GitHub Pages using MkDocs.

docs.title: Steps:
docs.text:
1. Push your changes to main branch.
  2. The GitHub Actions pipeline will automatically deploy the site.
  3. Visit: https://yourusername.github.io/uvicorn-app-server/

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Welcome to the Uvicorn App Server documentation!
